metadata.title: CVE-2024-5171 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer overflow in img_alloc_helper of libaom

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-5171` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

aom-tools - 3.8.2-2ubuntu0.1
libaom3 - 3.8.2-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: aom package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.8.2-2ubuntu0.1').
